מטה אינטל. מקור: Intel
The talented Product Development Engineer that will join us, will be responsible for leading a team, ensuring the testability and manufacturability of integrated circuits from the component feasibility stage through production ramp.
You will make significant contributions to design, development and validation of testability circuits. In addition you will be in-charge on evaluation, development and debug of complex test methods. Develop and debug complex software programs to convert design validation vectors and drive complex test equipment. Creates and tests validation and production test hardware solutions. You will tests, validates, modifies and re-designs circuits to guarantee component margin to specification. Analyzes and evaluates component specification versus performance to ensure optimal match of component requirements with production equipment capability with specific emphasis on yield analysis and bin split capability.
Analyze early customer returns with emphasis on driving test hole closure activities. Create and applies concepts for optimizing component production relative to both quality and cost constraints. You will run autonomously plans and schedules own daily tasks, develops solutions to problems utilizing formal education and judgment.
Requirements:
– 2+ years of managing an engineering team, building project plans and interfacing with external product stakeholders
– 5+ years of DFT experience for processor and/or SOC designs
– Knowledge about industrial standards and practices in DFT, including ATPG, JTAG
– Knowledge of Verilog and/or VHDL, and experience with simulators and waveform debugging tools
– Solid Understanding of design verification (DV) methodologies
– Advantage – Experience in debugging ATPG patterns, Compressed ATPG patterns
– Ability to conduct experiments during silicon debug, gathering and analyzing data.
Do you want to find yourself surrounded with people just like you – curious, professional, hungry and dedicated? Wish to enjoy new and amazing challenges and play a significant role in touching the lives of billions around the world – Click for application.

The release manager will be responsible for leading the versions execution in R&D scrum teams. As part of his ownership, the release manager will create detailed planning for R&D releases, including timeline, scope, resources, dependencies. The release manager will lead the execution of the releases by coordinating the different dependencies in and/or out of R&D departments, manage the release’s risks, remove execution barriers and communicate their status to the organization.
The release manager will work closely with the R&D scrum teams: developers and product owners.
A strong candidate will have a solid experience with technology and software project management methodology. He/she will possess strong analytic skills as well as strong communication skills, capacity planning, project/program management, processes, and change management.
Responsibilities:
– Responsible for release planning and management, starting from design plan to production
– Responsible for resource planning and time plan.
– Responsible for production control and roll out.
– Responsible for beta channel management.
Requirements:
– B.A/BSc in computer science or engineering
– 10 years’ experience working with in R&D departments
– At least 5 years’ experience in managing R&D teams or in Release and Project management of product – must!
– Knowledge in Agile methodology – Must!
– Experience with SAAS/Web products – big advantage!
– Strong understanding of Product and Software Development Methodology/Life cycle and program management processes.
– Strong track record of delivering results.
